content:
Today, on March 18, Senator of the United States of America Lindsey Graham arrived in Kiev.

About thisreportedU.S. Embassy in Ukraine.

“Today we congratulate Senator Lindsey Graham in Kiev. Unmistakable support of the United States is crucial to Ukraine's success in confrontation with an illegal full -scale war with Russia! ” - The message says.

As reportedArmyinform, recently in Kiev, on a working visit, the Foreign Minister Moldova Mikhai Poshay was on a working visit. Together with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine, Dmitry Kuleba, they laid flowers on the wall of memory of the dead for Ukraine, located near St. Michael's Golden-Domed Monastery.
title: U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham arrives in Kyiv
description: This was reported by the US Embassy in Ukraine.  "Today, we welcome Senator Lindsey Graham to...
author: Army Inform
